main event: A pilot observed an unidentified object while flying from Ashland to Richmond at 8000 feet altitude for 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object moved toward the pilot before departing straight up at high speed,Several reports likely suggested the same object based on sightings from Ashland and Richmond,The object was speculated to be a balloon, aircraft, astronomical object, or unidentified due to insufficient data,The witness reported hearing no distinctive sound typical of aircraft during the sighting, and the entire incident lasted for about 30 seconds.
witness description: a pilot flying from Ashland to Richmond
